description: Represents an individual or company in Odoo. Partners can act as customers, vendors, or internal contacts.

examples.input: Create a new customer called ACME Corp
Update the email of Julian to julian@example.com
How many customers or vendors are there in singapore?
Show me the customer with the id of 123

hints: Customers and Vendors are both stored in res.partner.
A partner can be both a customer and a vendor simultaneously.
